greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of length/width of a meta-1st electrum rectangle.
comment: See A188618 for the definition of 1st electrum rectangle.  Briefly, it is a rectangle such that the removal of a golden rectangle from one end leaves a silver rectangle.
link: Clark Kimberling, A Visual Euclidean Algorithm, The Mathematics Teacher 76 (1983) 108-109.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 06 2011
